title: Language Learning Process Utilizing Adaptive Motivation and Emotional Support Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language proficiency and understanding of basic professional terminology
context.additional_context: Language education program for entry-level professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields, conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments with project-based assessments to measure learning outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can maintain motivation by utilizing self-directed learning strategies over 80% of the time when performing profession-related language tasks within four weeks
Learners can apply methods to improve emotional stability in the language learning process by over 70% through peer feedback and collaborative learning
Learners can improve language proficiency by two or more levels through goal-setting focused on personal growth rather than social comparison in project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
